column2: ALPHA BLACK TO BRAVO AND CHARLIE. BEGIN THE OPERATION. OVER.
ALPHA TO BRAVO AND CHARLIE. COMMENCE THE ASSAULT GO GO GO. OVER.
ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. OBJECTIVE ONE IS CLEARED. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. SECOND OBJECTIVE IS CLEARED. OVER.
ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. I AM GLAD TO ANNOUNCE THAT WE ARE IN CONTROL OF LIPANY NOW. ALPHA OUT.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. REINFORCEMENTS ARE BURNING DEFEATED. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. ROGER. PROCEED. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. COPY THAT. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. UNDERSTOOD. STAY SHARP FOR ANY ENEMY REINFORCEMENTS FROM NORTH. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. CONGRATULATIONS, JOB WELL DONE. MISSION IS ACCOMPLISHED. OVER.
